# gamefabric_secrets (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get all secrets without any filtering.
data "gamefabric_secrets" "all_of_environment" {
  environment = gamefabric_environment.prod.name
}

# Get secrets filtered by labels.
data "gamefabric_secrets" "game_type_alpha_configurations" {
  environment = gamefabric_environment.prod.name
  label_filter = {
    game-type = "alpha"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment` (String) The name of the environment the secrets belong to.

### Optional

- `label_filter` (Map of String) A map of keys and values that is used to filter secrets. Only items with all specified labels (exact matches) will be returned.
- `secrets` (Attributes List) Secrets is a list of secrets in the environment that match the labels filter. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--secrets))

<a id="nestedatt--secrets"></a>
### Nested Schema for `secrets`

Read-Only:

- `data` (List of String) Data contains the secret keys.
- `description` (String) Description of the secret.
- `environment` (String) The name of the environment the secret belongs to.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels are key/value pairs that can be used to organize and categorize objects.
- `name` (String) The unique secret name within its environment.
